imdb.plot outline: The series examines the lives of six foster kids who have aged out of the system, and who are left to struggle on the unforgiving streets of Los Angeles. Re-imagining JM Barrie's Peter Pan as a gritty street tale, our story revolves around a young drifter, Peter, who returns to Los Angeles to solve the murder of his former foster caretaker.
imdb.title: Fountain and Never
plot: The series examines the lives of six foster kids who have aged out of the system, and who are left to struggle on the unforgiving streets of Los Angeles. Re-imagining JM Barrie's Peter Pan as a gritty street tale, our story revolves around a young drifter, Peter, who returns to Los Angeles to solve the murder of his former foster caretaker.::Antonio Macia
